title: Ruby and Emerald Chandbali Earrings with Polki Diamonds
materials: Polki Diamonds (Natural Uncut Diamonds). Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Intricately handcrafted Chandbali style earrings featuring a ruby at the top and an emerald at the bottom, surrounded by a halo of sparkling Polki diamonds set in traditional Kundan style. The design is inspired by traditional Mughal and Nizam jewelry, seamlessly blending South Indian artistry with a touch of royalty. Features a delicate petal design around the gemstone.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to showcase your traditional elegance. Suitable for brides and attendees alike.
description: A unique combination of precious gemstones and uncut Polki diamonds, handcrafted by master artisans from Hyderabad. Its design blends Mughal and South Indian styles. The vibrant gemstones represent prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom piece. Durable construction ensures lasting beauty for generations.
